BNC User Reference Guide

<textClass>

textClass (text classification) groups information which describes the nature or topic of a text in terms of a standard classification scheme, thesaurus, etc.
Class model.profileDescPart att.declarable
Declaration 
element textClass { catRef, classCode*, keywords* }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [att.declarable ] )
Example
 <textClass
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <catRef targets="ALLTIM3 ..."/>
  <classCode scheme="DLEE">W hansard</classCode>
  <keywords>
   <term> Parliamentary debates </term>
  </keywords>
 </textClass>
Module header
